data.author: Richard Stallman
data.quote: When I do this, some people think that it's because I want my ego to be fed, right? Of course, I'm not asking you to call it 'Stallmanix'!

data.author: Richard Stallman
data.quote: I'm always happy when I'm protesting.

data.author: Richard Stallman
data.quote: Geeks like to think that they can ignore politics, you can leave politics alone, but politics won't leave you alone.

data.author: Richard Stallman
data.quote: If programmers deserve to be rewarded for creating innovative programs, by the same token they deserve to be punished if they restrict the use of these programs.

data.author: Richard Stallman
data.quote: Once GNU is written, everyone will be able to obtain good system software free, just like air.

data.author: Richard Stallman
data.quote: 'Free software' is a matter of liberty, not price. To understand the concept, you should think of 'free' as in 'free speech,' not as in 'free beer'.

data.author: Richard Stallman
data.quote: Playfully doing something difficult, whether useful or not, that is hacking.

data.author: Steve Ballmer
data.quote: Great companies in the way they work, start with great leaders.

data.author: Steve Ballmer
data.quote: What we’ve gone through in the last several years has caused some people to question ’Can we trust Microsoft?’

data.author: Larry Ellison
data.quote: When I do something, it is all about self-discovery. I want to learn and discover my own limits

data.author: Larry Ellison
data.quote: I have had all of the disadvantages required for success

data.author: Larry Ellison
data.quote: Great achievers are driven, not so much by the pursuit of success but by the fear of failure.

data.author: Larry Ellison
data.quote: When you innovate, you’ve got to be prepared for everyone telling you you’re nuts.

data.author: Larry Ellison
data.quote: See things in the present, even if they are in the future.

data.author: Larry Ellison
data.quote: A corporation’s primary goal is to make money.

data.author: Larry Ellison
data.quote: Wealth isn’t the same thing as intelligence.

data.author: Larry Ellison
data.quote: When you’re the first whose beliefs are different you’re saying, I’m right and everyone else is wrong.

data.author: Larry Ellison
data.quote: The only way to get ahead is to find errors in conventional wisdom.

data.author: Paul Allen
data.quote: What should exist? To me, that's the most exciting question imaginable. What do we need that we don't have? How can we realise our potential?

data.author: Paul Allen
data.quote: I'm always interested in finding ways to innovate... It's a blend; it's not a point focus.
